Software

The MATLAB code that I use in my research is maintaining on GitHub. If you are an experimental psychologist who uses neuroimaging in your research, the following software may be particularly useful to you:

  • bspmview
  • Why/How Localizer Task
  • fMRI Design Optimization Software
  • Psychtoolbox Utilities
  • List of Git Repositires
